description:

The activity involves manual soil digging and preparation of a vegetable planting bed inside an unused duck shelter.

The duck shelter was empty, with no animals present at the time of work.

The area is being repurposed for vegetable cultivation.

This record reflects real labor under actual farm conditions and is part of continuous daily operations.

Captured at 07:58 AM (Asia/Bangkok), this proof contributes to the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) system, ensuring traceable, verifiable documentation of real-world farm work.
